channel.title: Teaching & Learning on Aesthetic Perception & Cognition
channel.description: Recent content in Teaching & Learning on Aesthetic Perception & Cognition

item.title: Bibliography
item.description: Our investigation is firmly lodged between several on-going international debates and draws on the work produced in those contexts. Here you can find a list of key references. References Audi, R. 2013. Moral Perception. Princeton, NJ: Princeton University Press. Baumgarten, A. 1970. Aesthetica. Hildesheim & New York: Georg Olms. First published 1750. Beardsley, M. C. 1981. Aesthetics, Problems in the Philosophy of Criticism. London: Hackett.
